title: Snooze

description.plain: “Snooze” features SZA trying to be with a person who she loves so much. In the bridge, SZA is longing to be loved by this person, and be their number one. The love song was released as the eighth track on SZA’s very highly anticipated sophomore album, SOS, on December 9, 2022, and re-released as a single on August 25th, 2023 alongside a music video and an EP full of different versions of the track.

embed_content: Read “Snooze” by SZA on Genius
